problem_names:
lemma
  "compile ap s i = ci (layout ap) s i"
translations:
lemma
  "compile ap s i = ci (layout ap) s i"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. compile ap s i = ci (layout ap) s i

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x1.
       i = Inc x1 \<Longrightarrow> compile ap s i = ci (layout ap) s i
 2. \<And>x21 x22.
       i = Dec x21 x22 \<Longrightarrow> compile ap s i = ci (layout ap) s i
 3. \<And>x3.
       i = Goto x3 \<Longrightarrow> compile ap s i = ci (layout ap) s i
apply(simp add: ci.simps shift.simps start_of.simps tinc_b_def)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x21 x22.
       i = Dec x21 x22 \<Longrightarrow> compile ap s i = ci (layout ap) s i
 2. \<And>x3.
       i = Goto x3 \<Longrightarrow> compile ap s i = ci (layout ap) s i
apply(simp add: ci.simps shift.simps start_of.simps tdec_b_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x3.
       i = Goto x3 \<Longrightarrow> compile ap s i = ci (layout ap) s i
